string.value: After finally completing the letter, Romeo asked me if I could deliver the letter to #bJuliet#k for him. What am I, their loyal servant???
After receiving Romeo's heartfelt letter, Juliet shed a tear of joy. I don't understand how that letter brought her to tears, but...

Look, traveler! The letter is finally finished! I don't even know how many sheets of paper I went through writing this. Anyway, I bet Juliet will be ecstatic once she reads this letter. Now, please give this letter to #bJuliet#k for me.
The reason Juliet and I are going well right now is because of you. I will never, ever forget all the good deeds you're doing for us!
...I didn't expect you to say no... then who will give this letter to her? An owl? Package delivery? No, you're the only person that can help me. Please help me!
Hello, traveler. What is it this time? Is it... Romeo again...? What? Romeo wanted you to deliver that letter to me?

Ahh, I can't believe Romeo thought of me like that... this is quite a surprise. I am... beyond happy. I don't know how to react to this, other than being really really really happy. Thank you so much, traveler...
Haven't you gone to see Juliet yet? I am anxious to find out how she'll react to the letter.
Oh, hello traveler! What brought you back here? Is it... Romeo? Or not?

What? You lost the letter I was supposed to give to Juliet? Ah, don't worry too much about it. It took me such a long time to write it, that I memorized every line word by word. I'll write you another one.
